messages.message: Is there a way to restrict within split classify to 1 document of each type in a submission and then auto push the rest to "Other"? For example, if we need to classify 20+ across a packet -> can we inform the LLM that there is only 1 "loan app" versus 1 "insurance app" -> currently a lot gets classified in the wrong bucket. If we were able to restrict the 1, we could classify the significant docs and push the rest to other while we work on the optimization activities
Cc @hannah @Paul H this isnâ€™t covered in the advanced ocr work is it?
Unfortunately not a way to do this today @Andrew Sherrill

This is not covered with advanced OCR work. I know this use case well and more importantly than forcing what @Andrew Sherrill is trying to do today, we just need more accurate split classification capabilities
